featured.text: E. Eddie My childhood memory of a polar bear pacing back and forth in a very small space in a zoo keeps haunting me.

definition.zh_def: 與極地或極地地區有關的，或指極端的事物。
definition.en_def: Relating to the North or South Pole, or to the regions around them; also refers to something that is extreme or opposite.
definition.example: The polar bear is adapted to live in the icy conditions of the Arctic.
